on reading compounds: 暑中見舞【ショチュウミマイ】summer greeting card, inquiry after someone's health in the hot season
残暑【ザンショ】late summer heat, lingering summer heat
避暑【ヒショ】escaping the summer heat, going somewhere cooler during the summer, summering
kun reading compounds: 暑い【あつい】hot, warm, sultry, heated, passionate, impassioned, burning (desire, etc.), on everybody's mind, on the radar, du jour, interested (gaze, etc.)
暑い盛り【あついさかり】heat of the day, hottest part of the day
